overview: While a masked vigilante group known as the Vermin wreak havoc in Paradise City, a secret badass hiding in plain sight, Lucy (Ana Foxxx), is just trying to make ends meet. Working odd jobs -and as a call girl when the opportunity presents itself- she’s saving up every dollar so she can leave the city once and for all. After taking on a new client, Lucy gets pulled into the fight between the real Vermin vigilantes (Maddy May, Lucky Fate), a corrupt mayor (Scott Nails) and his wife (Kenna James), and the fake vigilante group doing the mayor’s dirty work.
title: Vigilante City
